abort.reauth_successful: Reauth successful! Component reload in progress.

error.unknown: Unknown error. Please check the Home Assistant log for more information.

pin.description: You have received a PIN code via email. Please enter the PIN code (six numbers)
pin.title: Connection setup - PIN

data.username: MB username - email address (or mobile phone including country code ex. +44)

user.description: Enter your Mercedes ME login account (email address)
user.title: Set up the Mercedes ME 2020 connection

confirm_restart.description: Restart of Home Assistant is required to finish auth update click submit to restart now.
confirm_restart.title: Restart required

abort.reauth_successful: Reauth successful! Component reload in progress.

data.delete_auth_file: Delete authentication token now. Requires a restart of Home Assistant after save.
data.pin: Security PIN (to be created in mobile app) - Enter 0 to delete the value from the configuration
data.save_files: DEBUG ONLY: Enable save server messages to the messages folder

init.description: Configure your options. Some changes require a restart of Home Assistant.
init.title: Mercedes ME 2020 Options

auxheat_configure.name: Auxheat configure
auxheat_configure.description: Command for configuring the auxiliary heating. It is possible to define three daytimes and select one active time.

time_selection.name: Time selection
time_selection.description: The activated auxiliary heating preset time (0=no_selection, 1=time_1, 2=time_2, 3=time_3)

time_1.name: time_1
time_1.description: Daytime in minutes after midnight. E.g. valid value for 8 am would be 480. Value range is 0 to 1439.

time_2.name: time_2
time_2.description: Daytime in minutes after midnight. E.g. valid value for 8 am would be 480. Value range is 0 to 1439.

time_3.name: time_3
time_3.description: Daytime in minutes after midnight. E.g. valid value for 8 am would be 480. Value range is 0 to 1439.

auxheat_start.name: Auxheat start
auxheat_start.description: Start the auxiliary heating of a car defined by a vin.

auxheat_stop.name: Auxheat stop
auxheat_stop.description: Stop the auxiliary heating of a car defined by a vin.

battery_max_soc_configure.name: Battery max soc configure
battery_max_soc_configure.description: Configure the maximum value for the state of charge of the HV battery of a car defined by a vin.

max_soc.name: Max Soc
max_soc.description: The maximum value for the state of charge of the HV battery (Value needs to be between 50 and 100 and divisible by ten)

charge_program_configure.name: Charge program configure
charge_program_configure.description: Command to select the charge program.

doors_unlock.name: Doors unlock
doors_unlock.description: Unlock a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

pin.name: Pin
pin.description: security pin, required if not stored in the settings.

doors_lock.name: Doors lock
doors_lock.description: Lock a car defined by a vin

download_images.name: Download images
download_images.description: Downloads the app images to the components resource folder for a car defined by a vin.

engine_start.name: Engine start
engine_start.description: Start the engine of a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

engine_stop.name: Engine stop
engine_stop.description: Stop the engine of a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

preconditioning_configure_seats.name: Preconditioning configure seats
preconditioning_configure_seats.description: Send a preconditioning seat configuration command to a car defined by a VIN.

front_left.name: Front left
front_left.description: Activate if the front left seat should be preconditioned.

front_right.name: Front right
front_right.description: Activate if the front right seat should be preconditioned.

rear_left.name: Rear left
rear_left.description: Activate if the rear left seat should be preconditioned.

rear_right.name: Rear right
rear_right.description: Activate if the rear right seat should be preconditioned.

preheat_start.name: Preconditioning start
preheat_start.description: Start the preconditioning of a car defined by a vin.

type.name: Type
type.description: Method that is used to initiate the start process. 0=Now (Default), 1=Immediate - Use Immediate in case your car does not support now.

preheat_start_departure_time.name: Preconditioning start with departure time
preheat_start_departure_time.description: Start the preconditioning of a car defined by a vin and a given departure time.

time.name: Time
time.description: Departure time in minutes after midnight. E.g. valid value for 8 am would be 480. Value range is 0 to 1439.

preheat_stop.name: Preconditioning stop
preheat_stop.description: Stop the preconditioning of a car defined by a vin.

preheat_stop_departure_time.name: Preconditioning stop mode departuretime
preheat_stop_departure_time.description: Stop the configured departure time preconditioning of a car defined by a vin.

sigpos_start.name: Start signal position
sigpos_start.description: Start light signaling of a car defined by a vin.

sunroof_open.name: Sunroof open
sunroof_open.description: Open the sunroof of a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

sunroof_tilt.name: Sunroof tilt
sunroof_tilt.description: Tilt the sunroof of a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

sunroof_close.name: Sunroof close
sunroof_close.description: Close the sunroof of a car defined by a vin.

temperature_configure.name: Target temperature configure (precond/auxheat)
temperature_configure.description: Configure the target preconditioning/auxheat temperatures for zones in a car defined by a VIN.

front_left.name: Front left
front_left.description: Target temperature for the zone front_left in CELSIUS.

front_right.name: Front right
front_right.description: Target temperature for the zone front_right in CELSIUS.

rear_left.name: Rear left
rear_left.description: Target temperature for the zone rear_left in CELSIUS. (if available)

rear_right.name: Rear right
rear_right.description: Target temperature for the zone rear_right in CELSIUS. (if available)

windows_open.name: Windows open
windows_open.description: Open the windows of a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

pin.name: Pin
pin.description: Security pin, required if not stored in the settings.

windows_close.name: Windows close
windows_close.description: Close the windows of a car defined by a vin. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

windows_move.name: Windows move
windows_move.description: Move the windows of a car defined by a vin to a new position. PIN setup required. See options dialog of the integration.

front_left.name: Front left
front_left.description: The new position of the front left window (0=closed, 10=ventilating, 100=open)

front_right.name: Front right
front_right.description: The new position of the front left window (0=closed, 10=ventilating, 100=open)

rear_left.name: Rear left
rear_left.description: The new position of the front left window (0=closed, 10=ventilating, 100=open)

rear_right.name: Rear right
rear_right.description: The new position of the front left window (0=closed, 10=ventilating, 100=open)

send_route.name: Route send
send_route.description: Sends a route to the car. (Single location only)

charging_break_clocktimer_configure.name: Charging Break Clocktimer Configure
charging_break_clocktimer_configure.description: Configure charging breaks (AC only). This will overwrite the complete config for all slots in your car.

starttime_timer_1.name: Start time (Timer 1)
starttime_timer_1.description: Start time of the charge break window (Timer 1)

stoptime_timer_1.name: End Time (Timer 1)
stoptime_timer_1.description: End time of the charge break window (Timer 1)

starttime_timer_2.name: Start time (Timer 2)
starttime_timer_2.description: Start time of the charge break window (Timer 2)

stoptime_timer_2.name: End Time (Timer 2)
stoptime_timer_2.description: End time of the charge break window (Timer 2)

starttime_timer_3.name: Start time (Timer 3)
starttime_timer_3.description: Start time of the charge break window (Timer 3)

stoptime_timer_3.name: End Time (Timer 3)
stoptime_timer_3.description: End time of the charge break window (Timer 3)

starttime_timer_4.name: Start time (Timer 4)
starttime_timer_4.description: Start time of the charge break window (Timer 4)

stoptime_timer_4.name: End Time (Timer 4)
stoptime_timer_4.description: End time of the charge break window (Timer 4)
